heading: HB04926
0: AN ACT INSTITUTIONALIZING BAMBOO INDUSTRY DEVELOPMENT IN THE PHILIPPINES, CREATING THE BAMBOO INDUSTRY RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT CENTER (BIRDC), APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
status: Scheduled for Deliberation by the Committee on Ways and Means on 2020-01-16
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB04926
FULL TITLE : AN ACT INSTITUTIONALIZING BAMBOO INDUSTRY DEVELOPMENT IN THE PHILIPPINES, CREATING THE BAMBOO INDUSTRY RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT CENTER (BIRDC), APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : SY-ALVARADO, "KUYA" JOSE ANTONIO R.
DATE FILED : 2019-09-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Tupas (000 2020-02-10)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2019-10-01
          -The Committee approved HBs 1274, 3309, 3373, 3469 and 4009 adopting HB 3469 as reference bill. The Secretariat was directed to prepare a substitute bill, subject to style, incorporating amendments proposed during the meeting.
      2. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2019-10-01
          -The Committee approved HBs 1274, 3309, 3373, 3469 and 4009 adopting HB 3469 as reference bill. The Secretariat was directed to prepare a substitute bill, subject to style, incorporating amendments proposed during the meeting.
      3. Transmitted to the Committee on Appropriations on 2019-12-09
      4. Transmmitted to the Committee on Ways and Means on 2019-12-09
      5. Scheduled for Deliberation by the Committee on Ways and Means on 2020-01-16
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON AGRICULTURE AND FOOD ON 2019-10-02
